channel.title: Towlr on TooNormal
channel.description: Recent content in Towlr on TooNormal

item.title: Towlr at “N Design” Exhibit
item.description: Towlr recently frustrated attendees at “N Design”, an art-game exhibit in Curitiba, Brazil. Very cool! Here are some photos of the event. Several other favorites were at the event, included a Rohrer game, a Terry Cavanagh game, and of course, Braid. More details can be found here.
